name: SpanText
author: Nate Beversluis

sections.description:
SpanText makes web text variable and interactive, embedding multiple versions or variations of a text into a single, flexible document. Any kind of web text with potential variation in length, tone, content, vocabulary, reading level, audience, or any other attribute, may be transformed into an engrossing web reading experience using SpanText.

Examples, usage instruction, and support are available at www.spantext.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/spantext directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
How do I use this?
www.spantext.com/download

Where can I get support?
www.spantext.com/support

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/spantext directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
• Optimizations and bug fixes
  • SpanText is now free.

short_description: SpanText creates flexible text for the web that transforms in real time to user interaction. Demo and support at www.spantext.com.
